Trigger.name: Cataclysm

regexCodeList.string: ^(You) unleash a raging cataclysm of destruction, the area directly surrounding (.+) becoming nothing but fire and ash\.$
^(You) prepare to unleash a cataclysm against (.+), but \w+ anticipates your intent and moves out of your target area\.$
^The flames that compose (\w+) burn brighter for a moment, but seeming to sense some danger (.+) quickly moves away from \w+ current position\.$
^As the flames that compose (\w+) burn ever brighter, the area surrounding (.+) is consumed in a raging cataclysm of destruction, the inferno burning white hot as it engulfs \w+\.$
